level.heading: Effect of reprogrammings on Maintenance of Effort and Matching funds.
level.text: Beginning in Fiscal Year 2002, the Chief Financial Officer shall certify that any proposed reprogramming by the Mayor will not affect the amounts necessary to meet and maintain the local requirements for Maintenance of Effort and Matching funds and the certification shall be included in the proposed reprogramming request submitted by the Mayor to the Council.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 4303 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).
